name: A secret place ChatGPT created for me to escape my mother's nagging
name_original: A secret place ChatGPT created for me to escape my mother's nagging
description:
The story starts with me and my mom having a quarrel, then "I" went to my room angrily, turned on the computer, and began confiding in the ChatGPT, asking if there was a good way to get away from my mom. Then AI created a secret space for me in my closet to hide from my mom.  But is this seemingly cool secret base really a good place?...

W, A, S, D to move

Space to jump

Shift to run
